data.data: Initial comments:This report is for the new service, Tele-Senior Care, beginning on December 6, 2023. St. Luke's Hospital - Monroe Campus attested they were in full compliance with the requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Hospitals, 28 PA Code, Part IV, Subparts A and B, November 1987, as amended June 1998. Plan of Correction: Initial comments:This report is for the new service, Tele-Senior Care, beginning on December 6, 2023. St. Luke's Hospital - Monroe Campus attested they were in full compliance with the requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Hospitals, 28 PA Code, Part IV, Subparts A and B, November 1987, as amended June 1998. Plan of Correction:

Initial comments:This report is for the new service, Telemedicine - Virtual Lactation Consulting Services, beginning on September 4, 2023. St. Luke's Hospital - Monroe Campus attested they were in full compliance with the requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Hospitals, 28 PA Code, Part IV, Subparts A and B, November 1987, as amended June 1998. Plan of Correction: Initial comments:This report is for the new service, Telemedicine - Virtual Lactation Consulting Services, beginning on September 4, 2023. St. Luke's Hospital - Monroe Campus attested they were in full compliance with the requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Hospitals, 28 PA Code, Part IV, Subparts A and B, November 1987, as amended June 1998. Plan of Correction:

Initial comments:This report is the result of an occupancy survey completed on April 25, 2023, at St. Luke's Hospital - Monroe Campus which included alterations to outpatient physical and occupational therapy suite located at 208 Lifeline Road, Suite 104, Stroudsburg, Pennsylvania, 18360. Based on the occupancy survey, it was determined the facility was in compliance with all applicable requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Hospitals, 28 Pa Code, Part IV, Subparts A and B, November 1987, as amended June 1998 and the current edition of the Guidelines for Design and Construction of Hospital and Health Care Facilities. Plan of Correction: Initial comments:This report is the result of an occupancy survey completed on April 25, 2023, at St. Luke's Hospital - Monroe Campus which included alterations to outpatient physical and occupational therapy suite located at 208 Lifeline Road, Suite 104, Stroudsburg, Pennsylvania, 18360. Based on the occupancy survey, it was determined the facility was in compliance with all applicable requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Hospitals, 28 Pa Code, Part IV, Subparts A and B, November 1987, as amended June 1998 and the current edition of the Guidelines for Design and Construction of Hospital and Health Care Facilities. Plan of Correction:

Initial comments:This report is the result of an occupancy survey conducted on March 27, 2023, at St. Luke's Hospital - Monroe Campus which included a new Medical Office Building, Smithfield Gateway, located at 125 Smithfield Lane, East Stroudsburg, PA, with the following outpatient suites: Care Now, Outpatient Lab Draw, Outpatient Diagnostic Radiology, Physical Therapy, and Women's Imagining Services. Based on the occupancy survey, it was determined the facility was in compliance with all applicable requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Hospitals, 28 Pa Code, Part IV, Subparts A and B, November 1987, as amended June 1998 and the current edition of the Guidelines for Design and Construction of Hospital and Health Care Facilities. Plan of Correction: Initial comments:This report is the result of an occupancy survey conducted on March 27, 2023, at St. Luke's Hospital - Monroe Campus which included a new Medical Office Building, Smithfield Gateway, located at 125 Smithfield Lane, East Stroudsburg, PA, with the following outpatient suites: Care Now, Outpatient Lab Draw, Outpatient Diagnostic Radiology, Physical Therapy, and Women's Imagining Services. Based on the occupancy survey, it was determined the facility was in compliance with all applicable requirements of the Pennsylvania Department of Health's Rules and Regulations for Hospitals, 28 Pa Code, Part IV, Subparts A and B, November 1987, as amended June 1998 and the current edition of the Guidelines for Design and Construction of Hospital and Health Care Facilities. Plan of Correction:

Initial comments:This report is the result of an occupancy survey conducted on March 27, 2023, at St. Luke's Hospital - Monroe Campus which included renovations to Outpatient Lab Draw Site located at 208 Lifeline Rd, Suite 103, Stroudsburg PA, 18360.
